naslov: Ekskluzivna moderna kuća (1000 m2) sa bazenom, vrtom i garažom (iznajmljivanje)
Lokacija: Grad Zagreb, Gornja Dubrava, Gornja Dubrava
opis: Agencija Zagreb4U Vam predstavlja luksuznu više-etažnu kuću od 1000 m2 unutarnjeg prostora plus okućnica, 1300 m2 brutto. Kuća je koncipirana na način da je dio kuće predviđen za poslovni prosotor (poseban ulaz) koji se sastoji od 3 etaže: -1 etaža: server soba, 2 prostorije Prizemlje: ulazni prostor, wc, recepcija, soba za sastanke sa odvojenim dijelom za direktora 1. kat: 3 prostorije: Drugi dio kuće je rezidencijalni (poseban ulaz) te se on sastoji od: Prizemlja: bazen od 12 metara dužine, terasa, vrt, teretana, sauna, kupaonica sa wc-om, kuhinja, prostorija za druženje, vešeraj 1. kata sa galerijom: dnevni boravak, kuhinja, garaža, 2 wc-a, galerija: 3 spavaće sobe od kojih glavna spavaća (55 m2) ima walk-in ormar i svoju kupaonicu, kupaonice, terase. Kući pripada velika garaža za 2 auta i do 5 metara dužine. Te dodatnih 7 vanjskih parking mjesta. Fotografije iz oglasa su napravljene širokokutnim profesionalnim fotoaparatom te nisu uređivane na način da nekretnina izgleda bolje nego u stvarnosti, a za dobivanje boljeg osjećaja prostora i rasporeda prostorija u nekretnini preporučujemo proći kroz virtuanu šetnju nekretnine: VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/2967/ UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 1 mjesečna najamnina AGENT: Darko 095 351 2309 ili darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV ------------------------------------------------------------- Luxurious multi-storey house with 1000 m2 of interior space plus garden, 1300 m2 gross. The house is designed in such a way that part of the house is intended for a business space (separate entrance), which consists of 3 floors: -1 floor: server room, 2 rooms Ground floor: entrance area, toilet, reception, meeting room with a separate area for the director 1st floor: 3 rooms The second part of the house is residential (separate entrance) and it consists of: Ground floor: swimming pool 12 meters long, terrace, garden, gym, sauna, bathroom with toilet, kitchen, social room, laundry room 1st floor with gallery: living room, kitchen, garage, 2 toilets, gallery: 3 bedrooms, of which the master bedroom (55 m2) has a walk-in closet and its own bathroom, bathrooms, terrace. The house has a large garage for 2 cars and up to 5 meters in length. And additional 7 outdoor parking spaces. The photos from the ad were taken with a wide-angle professional camera and were not edited in such a way that the property looks better than in reality, and to get a better sense of the space and layout of the rooms in the property, we recommend going through a virtual tour of the apartment: VIRTUAL TOUR: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/2967/ CONDITIONS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 1 monthly rent AGENT: Darko +385 95 351 2309 or darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCY FEE FROM LESSEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
